title: Created To Win!
description: It is an inspirational/motivational book written to help you get on the right course to win the race of life. In its pages are 12 Keys to True Success that will help the reader discover God's plan for their lives. The built-in study guide provides immediate action to ensure personal application and retention of the material. Discover a passionate, life-changing, yet distinctly spritual way of achieving true success.
author: Kevin Baerg
